original: Cittānuparivattiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: citta anuparivattim kusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta anuparivattī na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Cittānuparivattiṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: citta anuparivattim akusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta anuparivattī na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
